title: IntelliWrite Pro
description: Custom AI writing assistant leveraging multiple LLMs for technical documentation, blog posts, and creative content with advanced context awareness.
details: Developed a specialized content creation platform that combines multiple language models for diverse writing tasks. Features include context-aware suggestions, industry-specific templates, plagiarism detection, and collaborative editing. Implemented custom prompt engineering and fine-tuning techniques for domain-specific content generation with 40% improvement in content quality metrics.

title: DataViz Studio
description: Interactive business intelligence platform with machine learning-powered insights, automated anomaly detection, and customizable visualization components.
details: Built a comprehensive analytics platform featuring interactive visualizations, predictive modeling, and automated insight generation. Includes real-time data streaming, custom dashboard builder, and ML-powered trend analysis. Achieved 25% faster data processing through optimized algorithms and implemented advanced statistical analysis for business intelligence.

title: DocuSmart AI
description: Intelligent document processing system using computer vision and NLP for automated data extraction, classification, and workflow integration.
details: Created an end-to-end document processing pipeline utilizing advanced OCR, named entity recognition, and document classification. Features include batch processing, quality validation, and API integration for existing workflows. Achieved 92% accuracy in data extraction and reduced manual processing time by 70% for enterprise clients.

title: AgentFlow Framework
description: Multi-agent coordination system for complex task automation featuring specialized AI agents for research, analysis, and content creation.
details: Designed a modular multi-agent system where specialized AI agents collaborate on complex workflows. Includes agent orchestration, task delegation, inter-agent communication, and human oversight capabilities. Successfully deployed for automated research synthesis, code review processes, and content creation pipelines with 60% efficiency improvement.

title: CollabSpace Hub
description: Modern team collaboration platform with real-time editing, integrated communication, project tracking, and AI-enhanced productivity features.
details: Developed a comprehensive collaboration platform supporting real-time document editing, video conferencing, task management, and team analytics. Features AI-powered meeting summaries, intelligent notifications, and productivity insights. Built with scalable microservices architecture supporting 1000+ concurrent users with 99.9% uptime.

title: TechBlog Engine
description: Personal technical blog platform with markdown support, syntax highlighting, search functionality, and integrated analytics dashboard.
details: Built a custom blogging platform optimized for technical content with advanced markdown support, code highlighting, and search capabilities. Features include automated SEO optimization, reading analytics, newsletter integration, and responsive design. Achieved 95+ PageSpeed scores and implemented advanced caching strategies for optimal performance.
